text: “Malaa, deenei la nia mee ala e helekai iei Au, go Tagi go Yihowah, adu gi goodou. E donu bolo di waahale deenei la go di baalanga dunudunu, gei aahee la nia goneiga? Aalaa go nia huaidina dangada ala ne daaligi go goodou! Goodou ga hagalee noho i kinei, Au gaa kili goodou gi daha mo di waahale deenei!
